docs.title: Welcome Aboard!
docs.text: Welcome to ScholarPilot, your premier destination for navigating the complex and fascinating world of knowledge. Here, we believe that every reading journey is an adventure worth sharing.

docs.title: Explore. Learn. Share.
docs.text: At ScholarPilot, we curate and share insightful content ranging from deep philosophical inquiries to practical daily tips. Whether you're a seasoned scholar or a curious newcomer, there’s always something new to discover.

docs.title: Featured Sections
docs.text:
• Philosophy Aisle: Dive deep into the minds of the great thinkers.
  • Tech Corner: Stay updated with the latest in technology and innovation.
  • Literature Lounge: Explore classic and contemporary literary works.
  • Mindful Moments: Tips for mindfulness and personal growth.

docs.title: Join Our Crew
docs.text:
Embark on this scholarly adventure with us by subscribing to our newsletter and following us on our social media channels. Get ready to set sail on a journey of lifelong learning!

Because at ScholarPilot, we don't just learn to live—we live to learn!

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
